snippet.title: Mario Goes Skateboarding 64 | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
After 5 months of hard work I am very excited to present my first ever Romhack: Mario goes Skateboarding 64! A very personal passion project where I get to put many aspects of my life that I love into one playable experience!

Play and download it here:

https://romhacking.com/hack/mario-goes-skateboarding-64

Or here:
 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sorIu14duJGhONMMpI-fjcvH6OMunFVl/view?usp=drivesdk 
(you gotta patch this into a Mario 64 copy with Floating IPS)


If you have trouble making it work through these links or you just wanna play on mobile, DM me through any of my socials! ==;)

https://aphid-kirby.tumblr.com

https://bsky.app/profile/aphidkirby.bsky.social

https://www.instagram.com/nimbreeze42


Hope you have fun visiting the skateparks I love so dearly ==:)


Music Credits:
White Ball by Miracle Musical
Remade in the SM64 Soundfont by FatherSheep
